home.bio_p1: A Computer Science student focusing on offensive cybersecurity, I work versatilely across the full development stack, from low-level to front-end.
home.bio_p2: My approach prioritizes code clarity, efficiency, and security, with extensive experience in vulnerability exploitation and a solid command of Linux.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Introduction
about.bio: As a Computer Science student at Veiga de Almeida University, I focus on offensive cybersecurity. My development approach prioritizes code clarity and efficiency, from designing algorithms in C/C++ to implementing responsive interfaces in TypeScript. I have extensive experience in proactively identifying security flaws in web applications and embedded systems, along with a solid command of best practices in Linux and network protocols.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies I have worked with or had contact with in an academic environment or personal projects.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Completed (or almost completed) projects and the technologies used.

terminal.bio:
Hi, my name is Matheus.
I'm 18 years old and a cybersecurity student. I have solid experience in exploiting SQL injection, XSS, and buffer overflows. 
Advanced reconnaissance with Nmap, Gobuster, ARP sweep, and automated parameter fuzzing in Burp Suite.
